title: Google launches Gemini to replace Bard chatbot
description:
Google has launched its AI chatbot called Gemini, which replaces its short-lived Bard service. Unveiled in December, Bard was touted as a competitor to chatbots like ChatGPT but failed to impress in demos. Google staff even called the launch “botched” and slammed CEO Sundar Pichai. Now rebranded as Gemini, Google says it represents the company’s... Read more »

The post Google launches Gemini to replace Bard chatbot appeared first on AI News.
